paragraphs.body: Shadley was born in Winter Park, Florida, to Shari and Rick Shadley, a landscape architect, and has an older sister named Sydney. Shadley's first acting role was in a play of A Christmas Carol, in which he played Tiny Tim, and he later appeared in the television series Dirty Sexy Money as Brian Darling Jr. and the 2010 Jackie Chan film The Spy Next Door. His other television credits include an appearance in the sixth season of How I Met Your Mother as Barney's half-brother and an appearance in season five of Ghost Whisperer. He also provided the voice for Gorgonzola in the cartoon series Chowder.
